comments.text:
Hello, chopin, thanks for the report.

You can describe the problem in your native language, if that helps you express it better and in more detail.

As far as I understand it, something flickers when you click a toolbar, or a button on a toolbar; you expect a menu to appear instead. Is your problem similar to bug 624329 (there is a video)?
comments.author: deletesoftware+moz@yandex.ru
comments.creator: deletesoftware+moz@yandex.ru
